title: Helena Morrissey quits fund manager amid talk of top Bank of England or politics job
text:
Star fund chief Dame Helena Morrissey has stepped up her campaign for a top role in politics or at the Bank of England after resigning from Britain’s biggest asset manager.

Dame Helena’s departure from Legal & General will spark further speculation she could succeed Mark Carney as the Bank’s Governor after she was interviewed for the job. A successor is due to be revealed within weeks.

A source said she was among the top three candidates for the position - and added there are is also talk of a House of Lords appointment, which could open the door to a senior ministerial role.

An outspoken Brexiteer, Dame Helena is known to have spent this year’s Tory conference burnishing her credentials with...
description: Star fund chief Dame Helena Morrissey has stepped up her campaign for a top role in politics or at the Bank of England after resigning from Britain’s biggest asset manager.
